articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Russian President
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of sympathy to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of the Russian Federation, as regards the fire accident in Perm of Russia that claimed many casualties.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep condolences and sympathy to the president and, through him, to the victims and the bereaved families

articles.title: Credentials of UNICEF Representative Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of UNICEF Representative Accepted
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Representative of the United Nations Children's Fund Bijaya Rajbhandari presented his credentials to DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Monday.
					After accepting the credentials Pak had a talk with the representative.

articles.title: DR Congo Gov. Delegation Here
articles.content:
DR Congo Gov. Delegation Here
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A government delegation of the Democratic Republic of Congo headed by Ignace Gata Mavita, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, arrived here by air on Monday.
					 The DPRK government hosted a reception for the delegation on the same day.

articles.title: KCC Go Program Wins Gold Medal
articles.content:
KCC Go Program Wins Gold Medal
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- KCC computer go program of the DPRK placed first at the 3rd Computer Go Program Contest held in Japan recently.
					Entries into the contest included more than 30 programs developed by ace teams from various countries and regions including the DPRK, Japan, the United States and France.
					
					Young scientists of the DPRK upgraded the level of the go program this time; they made the core module of their program in Korean-style and independently set up the process of simultaneous search and scatter format process, etc. requiring high technology.
					
					The KCC go program beat with an overwhelming edge the best programs presented by teams of various other countries which used high-performance large computers even under the unfavorable situation where its developers were barred from participating in the contest due to the Japanese reactionaries' hostile policy toward the DPRK and only ordinary computers had to be used for their program. 
					
					Thus the KCC go program of the DPRK has retained the title of the international go program contest for the seventh time.

articles.title: New Model of Water Refiner
articles.content:
New Model of Water Refiner
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A water refiner developed by the Electronic Material Institute of Kim Il Sung University is getting popularity among users.
					 The refiner consists of a sterilizing filter, system of adsorbing impure organic matters and resisting germs, air tube, automatic water gate and water feeder.
					
					 It fully filters and sterilizes water, while passing all sorts of mineral matters contained in the water, as nanoscale inorganic germicides are attached to stomatal walls by a high temperature in the diatomite-zeolite porous filtering and absorbing system.
					
					 It has widely been used not only in houses and offices but in foodstuff processing and public catering sectors.

articles.title: Hamhung City Youth Goat Farm
articles.content:
Hamhung City Youth Goat Farm
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Hamhung City Youth Goat Farm in Raeil District, South Hamgyong Province is one of the largest stock-breeding bases in the DPRK.
					 In the workers' district there are dwelling houses, dormitories, school, clinic, shop, hostel, bath-house, TV relay station and other entertainment and welfare centres as well as many pens and milk processing facilities. It also has six power stations.
					
					 Along long-stretching pasturage courses, scores of branch farms are placed in seven areas. 
					
					 Workshops where pigs, rabbits, geese and other domestic animals are raised with by-products from milk processing and a granulated fodder workshop are also operated on a high level as required by the new century.
					
					Sixty kinds of anti-epizootic Koryo medicines are prepared in the farm's fully-equipped Koryo veterinary pharmacy.
					
					 Chlorella is cultivated in an area of hundreds of square meters, where automatic monitoring and control devices are installed in the production processes to help increase the weight of such animals as goat and pig and boost the milk output.
					
					 The milk processing workshop is furnished with automatic bottle and vinyl bag packing machines and a large freezer as well as production processes of butter, cheese and yogurt.
					
					 Compared with the figures eight years ago, the milk production has increased two times, the output of milk processed goods 2.4 times and the number of goats 1.7 times.
					
					 Indeed, the goat farm has made a great contribution to improving the diet of residents in the province.

articles.title: Intention of U.S.-Japan Secret Pact on Nukes Exposed
articles.content:
Intention of U.S.-Japan Secret Pact on Nukes Exposed
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Former Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of Japan Murata, in his recent interview with a newspaper, said that there was a document on the secret pact between Japan and the United States, made in 1960 when the "Japan-U.S. Security Treaty" was revised. Under this pact the Japanese government agreed to tacitly approve the stopover in Japan of U.S. military ships carrying nuclear weapons and their transit through its territorial waters.
					 At that time the introduction of U.S. nukes into Japan had to go through "prior consultation" between the two countries. But, the said secret pact allowed any U.S. military ship carrying nukes to stop over and pass through Japanese territorial waters without such "prior consultation" in the event of "contingency" in the Far East.
					
					 Commenting on this fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday points out that the "contingency" in the Far East, stipulated in the document on the secret pact, means "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 As a result, it has been clearly proven once again that the said document is a criminal nuclear war document for use of nukes in the "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula and the U.S. is the very one that spawned the nuclear issue on the peninsula, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Clear is the aims sought by the U.S. in having concluded this nuclear secret pact with Japan.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' Asia strategy for aggression is a strategy of strength, a strategy for nuclear war. The U.S., with the design to occupy the whole of the Korean Peninsula and dominate Asia by igniting another Korean war, is seeking to use Japan as an operational and logistic base and a sortie base for attack on the DPRK and other Asian countries. The U.S. intends to carry out a war by hurling its task forces from its mainland, Japan and other regions into the Korean front in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. That is why the U.S. imperialists concluded the said pact with Japan, its junior ally, while deploying its huge nuclear weapons there.
					
					 The U.S. can neither conceal its despicable colors as the very one that caused the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and spawned the present nuclear crisis nor evade its responsibility for them. It had better retract the above-said secret pact immediately and withdraw its nuclear armed forces from south Korea and Japan.

articles.title: Korean People Called upon to Emerge Victors
articles.content:
Korean People Called upon to Emerge Victors
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon all the people in the DPRK to advance by leaps and bounds with the same revolutionary enthusiasm and spirit as displayed in the period of the grand Chollima advance and thus fully demonstrate the dignity and honor of being victors in the final charge for successfully concluding this year's assignments. 
					 It was the Chollima era when the country witnessed the might of the harmonious whole in which the leader believed in the people and they reposed their absolute trust in him and followed him and when it was pervaded with the revolutionary spirit of devotedly translating all the intentions of the Party and the leader into realities by going through thick and thin, the heroic spirit of boldly pulling through any trial and the militant stamina of making uninterrupted innovations and advance without allowing even a moment's stagnation and marking time, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean people successfully built a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense, on this land by carrying out the historic task of industrialization in a matter of just 14 years in the spirit of Chollima and with the speed of advance which required them to take a hundred steps while others did just one step. 
					
					 The spirit displayed in the Chollima era was a noble spiritual legacy which made a history of great surge in the Korean revolution. This spirit serves as an ideological and moral treasure as it helps bolster the Korean people's mental power a thousand times and encourages them to win a victory in the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge though the circumstances and conditions of the revolution have changed and one generation has been replaced by another.
					
					 The course of the Korean people's heroic struggle for paving the way for socialism of Korean style remains shining thanks to the inheritance of the history and tradition of the grand Chollima advance. 
					
					 They are now living and struggling in the era of a new advance for effecting a great surge to turn the socialist country into a thriving nation. 
					
					 All the Party members and other working people should wage a more dynamic 100-day campaign in the spirit of Songun Chollima in hearty response to the militant appeal of the WPK and fully demonstrate the heroic spirit of Songun Korea dashing ahead like the wind towards thriving nation.

articles.title: Earlier National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Earlier National Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- National reunification is the task of the times the fulfillment of which brooks not a moment's delay and it is the duty which should be performed by the present generation under any circumstances, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The country's reunification is a sacred cause of bringing about a future when the nation will enjoy eternal prosperity and enabling the younger generation to enjoy happiness and prosperity. 
					
					 If the Koreans fail to reunify their country in the present generation and allow its division to go on, the generations to come will be subject to misfortune and sufferings in the country divided into the north and the south, making them behave like strangers.
					
					 The national split is a source of great misfortune for the younger generation, the future and hope of the country.
					
					 The Koreans should never allow themselves to hand down to the next generation the nation's task of the country's reunification. 
					
					 If the country's reunification is passed on the next generation again, this will mean the present generation committing grave crimes against history and the nation.
					
					Both Korea and its nation are one. The division of the Korean nation constitutes temporary twists and turns and misfortune in its history spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 Whoever with the blood and soul of the Korean nation should vigorously turn out in the nation-wide reunification movement for reunifying the country in the present generation without fail in order to leave a tangible trace of patriotism to be remembered by history and posterity.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of the whole nation to proudly live as a reunited nation in the reunified country and it is an inevitable trend of the nation's history to work for the country's reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Development of Science and Technology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Development of Science and Technology
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- In order to win shining victory in the on-going gigantic drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation it is necessary to channel great efforts into the development of science and technology with a firm grip on the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to science and technology. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Both rapid progress in economy and the bolstering-up of military capability can be guaranteed by science and technology. If science and technology develop, one can become a strong one but if one is backward in them, one is bound to be weak. This is the main feature of the present era.
					
					 There is nothing to fear and no fortress unconquerable in the world if the most revolutionary idea and the invincible arms are supported by the latest science and technology.
					
					 The development of science and technology provides a sure guarantee for demonstrating the dignity of the nation by bolstering up the overall national power of the country and serves as an engine for steadily creating everything new and ultra-modern and making a leap forward to build a thriving nation.
					
					 It is an essential requirement for protecting the independent dignity of the nation to bolster up the national power of the country and this work can prove successful only when it is supported by science and technology.
					
					 It is the intention and wish of the WPK to make faster leap forward by going beyond the phases covered by other countries in the development of science and technology.
					
					 Push back the frontiers of science. This is the slogan the Korean people should put up at present.
					
					 Only when they dash ahead to push back the frontiers of science at a single step when others take a hundred steps, can they accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation with flying colors. 
					
					 There are for them a solid foundation and potentiality for developing science and technology provided under the Party's leadership and a large contingent of able scientists and technicians.
					
					 All the party members and other working people, scientists and technicians should powerfully demonstrate the independent dignity of the country and the stamina to win a sure victory by thoroughly implementing the Party's policy of attaching importance to science and technology.

articles.title: S. Korean Suppression of Trade Unions Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Suppression of Trade Unions Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Government Employees' Union of south Korea called a press conference to denounce the authorities' suppression of the union on Dec. 4, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The union accused the "government" of resorting to such repressive moves as closing its branch offices and disallowing the establishment of the union and so on. This is a wanton violation of the rights of workers and the right of the trade unions to organise, it held. 
					
					 The Railway Workers' Union also called a press conference on Dec. 3 at which it denounced the "government" and the management side for trampling down upon the rights of the people and suppressing the trade unions by terming the demands of the trade unions for the right to existence "illegal ones" under the pretext of "economic recovery."

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- An explanatory meeting was held in Russia, a lecture in India and a film show in Ethiopia between Nov. 25 and 29 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean Peopleâ€™s Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					Speeches were made at the events.
					
					The chief of the Technological Department of the Russian Centre for the International Scientific and Technological Bulletins said he got to know well about the facts that Kim Jong Il has ceaselessly provided field guidance to KPA units and different sectors of the national economy though he has been so busy and the Korean people have achieved great successes in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under his wise leadership.
					
					The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi praised Kim Jong Il for having led the showdown with the imperialists to victory, saying that nearly two decades since his assumption of the KPA supreme commandership were the days when his personality as the brilliant commander was fully demonstrated.
					
					The secretary general of the Juche Idea Study Society in Uttar Pradesh State of India noted that
						 Kim Jong Suk performed great exploits for the liberation of Korea and the cause of building a new country. What is conspicuous in her exploits is that she provided a sure guarantee for carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche through generations, the secretary general stressed.

articles.title: Impressive Story Associated with Side Dishes
articles.content:
Impressive Story Associated with Side Dishes
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- One day in December, Juche 48 (1959) President Kim Il Sung called at the Changjon Grocery in Central District, Pyongyang, 
					 Making a stop in front of the seasoning counter, he found no red pepper, a favorite one of the Korean people, on sale.
					
					 He said that ground red pepper was a good seasoning and red pepper leaves, fried or just seasoned, were considered a good dish and that the Korean ancestors had been fond of pickles.
					
					 He continued to say that a variety of spices should be prepared to suit the taste of the Korean people and supplied to them.
					
					  Implied in his instructions was his intention to provide the people with more tasty side dishes, preserving the national tradition and customs.

articles.title: Jimmy Carter elogia a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Jimmy Carter elogia a Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El ex presidente estadounidense Jimmy Carter elogio en alto las nobles personalidades del Presidente Kim Il Sung en su entrevista concedida el 23 de noviembre con el periodico tailandes "The Nation".
					Al recordar aquel encuentro con el Presidente durante su visita a Corea en 1994, el ex mandatario norteamericano lo califico de muy destacado y grandioso lider quien estuvo versado en todo.
					
					Prosiguio que el Presidente era hombre de amplios conocimientos y casi estaba al tanto de todo, por ejemplo, sabia cuando fue construido cierto edificio y de que servia este.
					
					Recordo que le salieron bien las conversaciones con el Presidente porque el era muy franco y modesto.
					
					El Presidente pensaba siempre antes de fallecer en la cumbre entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, destaco y expreso su conviccion de que se reconciliaran ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Por ultimo, deseo que la actual administracion norteamericana entre en el dialogo directo con la RPDC.
					
					Esta entrevista fue trascendida el 24 de noviembre por Reuters de Gran Bretana y el Servicio de Radiodifusion Apsara de Camboya.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a Dmitri Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a Dmitri Medvedev
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, en relacion con que fue causada la gran perdida humana por el accidente de  incendio ocurrido en Perm de este pais.
					El remitente expresa profundas condolencias y consuelo al destinatario y, por su conducto, a los damnificados y sus familiares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia acuerdo secreto EE.UU-Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia acuerdo secreto EE.UU-Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En reciente entrevista con un periodico, el ex viceministro de Relaciones exteriores de Japon, Murata, aclaro que durante la revision del "tratado de seguridad Japon-EE.UU." de 1960, hubo un documento sobre el acuerdo secreto, segun el cual el gobierno japones toleraria tacitamente la escala y el paso por sus aguas jurisdiccionales de los buques estadounidenses cargados de armas nucleares.
					 Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este lunes un comentario individual.
					
					Si bien la introduccion de armas nucleares de EE.UU. en Japon requeria el "debate previo" entre ambas partes, dichos buques norteamericanos tenian esas prerrogativas sin ser sometidos a ese debate bajo el pretexto de hacer frente al "tiempo de emergencia" del Extremo Oriente, especificamente, de la Peninsula Coreana, senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					 De esta manera, se ha revelado claramente que el documento de dicho acuerdo nuclear secreto EE.UU.-Japon es el criminal para el uso de armas nucleares en el supuesto "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana y que EE.UU. es el causante del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					 La estrategia agresiva de EE.UU. sobre Asia es la de fuerza, o sea, la de guerra nuclear. 
					
					 Partiendo de su ambicion de provocar la nueva guerra coreana para tomar toda la Peninsula Coreana y dominar a Asia, EE.UU. intenta utilizar a Japon como base de operaciones, logistica y salida contra la RPDC y otros paises asiaticos. 
					
					Por esta razon, piensa ejecutar la guerra trasladando al frente coreano en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana a sus tropas de ataque movil estacionadas en el territorio norteamericano, Japon y otras partes. He aqui la razon por la cual EE.UU. emplazo muchas armas nucleares en Japon y contrajo con este aliado inferior el arriba mencionado compromiso nuclear. 
					
					 EE.UU. no puede ocultar jamas su asquerosa naturaleza del causante del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana  y de la crisis nuclear de hoy ni evadir la responsabilidad por el respecto. 
					
					EE.UU. debe cancelar de inmediato su promesa secreta nuclear con Japon y retirar a sus fuerzas armadas nucleares del Sur de Corea y de este pais isleno.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a manifestar impetu revolucionario
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a manifestar impetu revolucionario
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El rotativo Rodong Sinmun, en su editorial fechado 7, exhorta a todos los coreanos a exaltar altamente la dignidad y el honor de triunfadores en la ofensiva final para concluir con brillantez este ano al producir la tempestad de salto con el entusiasmo e impetu revolucionarios del periodo de la gran marcha de Chollima.
					La epoca de Chollima fue precisamente la que reboso del poderio de cuerpo integral en que el lider confia en el pueblo y este cree absolutamente a aquel, del estilo revolucionario de materializar a costa de la vida el proposito del partido y el lider, del temperamento heroico con que supera con audacia cualesquier pruebas y del espiritu combativo de innovacion y avance continuos sin permitir la detencion y el estancamiento momentaneos.
					
					El  pueblo coreano termino solo dentro de 14 anos la tarea historica de la industrializacion con el espiritu y la velocidad de marcha de Chollima que avanza mas diez o cien pasos cuando otros dan un paso y construyo con dignidad sobre esta tierra la potencia socialista de independencia, autososten y autodefensa
					
					El espiritu de lucha de la epoca de Chollima es el noble legado espiritual que trajo la historia de gran auge de la revolucion coreana. Aunque se cambiaron las circunstancias y las condiciones de la revolucion y se sustituyo la generacion, el espiritu de Chollima sirve hoy tambien de un tesoro ideo-espiritual que eleva mas mil veces la fuerza espiritual del pueblo coreano y conduce a la victoria el gran auge revolucionario.
					
					La trayectoria de lucha heroica del pueblo coreano por abrir el camino del socialismo al estilo coreano brilla con la herencia de la historia y la tradicion de la gran marcha de Chollima.
					
					Hoy dia, vivimos y luchamos en la epoca de la marcha de nuevo y gran auge para poner la placa de la gran potencia prospera en la puerta de la patria socialista.
					
					En pleno acato al llamamiento combativo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, todos los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores deben avivar mas furiosamente las llamas de la campana de 100 dias con el espiritu de Chollima del Songun y poner de pleno manifiesto el impetu heroico de Corea del Songun que corre a todo galope hacia la gran potencia prospera.
